mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.price, s.sales, s.image, c.name as categoryName, s.describle, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_category sc ON s.id = sc.shop_id LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = sc.category_id ORDER BY s.id LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
